org.modelio.gproject.data.project

Class DescriptorServices

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modelio.gproject.data.project.DescriptorServices

  • public class DescriptorServices
extends Object
    Services that modify a project descriptor.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • merge

        public static void merge(ProjectDescriptor source,
                         ProjectDescriptor dest)
        Merges a project descriptor into another.

        Fragments and modules details in the source descriptor override the destination descriptor.

        Parameters:
        source - the descriptor whose content will be merged into the destination descriptor.
        dest - the descriptor that will be modified.

      • removeLocalPart

        public static void removeLocalPart(ProjectDescriptor projectDescriptor)
        Remove all local parts from the descriptor.
        Parameters:
        projectDescriptor - the project descriptor to clear.

      • removeSharedPart

        public static void removeSharedPart(ProjectDescriptor projectDescriptor)
        Remove all shared parts from the descriptor.

        Replaces shared fragments and modules descriptors by references if they contain local properties or authentication data.

        Parameters:
        projectDescriptor - the project descriptor to clear.

      • resolveUris

        public static void resolveUris(ProjectDescriptor projectDescriptor,
                               URI aRemoteUri)
        Modifies the descriptor to resolve the descriptor URIs against the given URI.
        Parameters:
        projectDescriptor - the descriptor to resolve.
        aRemoteUri - the remote project URI
